esv: For the eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to give strong support to those whose heart is blameless toward him.
niv: For the eyes of the Lord range throughout the earth to strengthen those whose hearts are fully committed to him.
nasb95: For the eyes of the Lord move to and fro throughout the earth that He may strongly support those whose heart is completely His.

esv: But from there you will seek the Lord your God and you will find him
niv: if you search after him with all your heart and with all your soul.
nasb95: But if from there you seek the Lord your God

esv: One thing have I asked of the Lord
niv: that will I seek after: that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life
nasb95: to gaze upon the beauty of the Lord and to inquire in his temple.

esv: For our sake he made him to be sin who knew no sin
niv: so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.
nasb95: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us

esv: I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live
niv: but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God
nasb95: who loved me and gave himself for me.

esv: But thanks be to God
niv: who in Christ always leads us in triumphal procession
nasb95: and through us spreads the fragrance of the knowledge of him everywhere.

esv: And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good
niv: for those who are called according to his purpose.
nasb95: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him

esv: But we have this treasure in jars of clay
niv: to show that the surpassing power belongs to God and not to us.
nasb95: But we have this treasure in jars of clay to show that this all-surpassing power is from God and not from us.

esv: For this light momentary affliction is preparing for us an eternal weight of glory beyond all comparison
niv: as we look not to the things that are seen but to the things that are unseen. For the things that are seen are transient
nasb95: but the things that are unseen are eternal.

esv: Open my eyes
niv: that I may behold wondrous things out of your law.
nasb95: Open my eyes that I may see wonderful things in your law.

esv: Make me understand the way of your precepts
niv: and I will meditate on your wondrous works.
nasb95: Cause me to understand the way of your precepts

esv: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
niv: Your word is a lamp for my feet
nasb95: a light on my path.

esv: Moreover
niv: as for me
nasb95: far be it from me that I should sin against the Lord by ceasing to pray for you

esv: and what you have heard from me in the presence of many witnesses entrust to faithful men
niv: who will be able to teach others also.
nasb95: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

esv: And Jesus came and said to them
niv: “All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Go therefore and make disciples of all nations
nasb95: baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit

esv: And let us consider how to stir up one another to love and good works
niv: not neglecting to meet together
nasb95: as is the habit of some

esv: who comforts us in all our affliction
niv: so that we may be able to comfort those who are in any affliction
nasb95: with the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God.

esv: Death and life are in the power of the tongue
niv: and those who love it will eat its fruits.
nasb95: The tongue has the power of life and death

esv: submitting to one another out of reverence for Christ.
niv: Submit to one another out of reverence for Christ.
nasb95: and be subject to one another in the fear of Christ.

esv: For the husband is the head of the wife even as Christ is the head of the church
niv: his body
nasb95: and is himself its Savior.

esv: Husbands
niv: love your wives
nasb95: as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.

esv: Likewise
niv: husbands
nasb95: live with your wives in an understanding way

esv: “For the man who does not love his wife but divorces her
niv: says the Lord
nasb95: the God of Israel

esv: And these words that I command you today shall be on your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children
niv: and shall talk of them when you sit in your house
nasb95: and when you walk by the way

esv: Trust in the Lord with all your heart
niv: and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him
nasb95: and he will make straight your paths.

esv: Whatever you do
niv: work heartily
nasb95: as for the Lord and not for men

esv: He has told you
niv: O man
nasb95: what is good; and what does the Lord require of you but to do justice

esv: For I am not ashamed of the gospel
niv: for it is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes
nasb95: to the Jew first and also to the Greek.

esv: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.
niv: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life
nasb95: and have it to the full.

esv: for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God
nasb95: for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God

esv: Beware lest you say in your heart
niv: my power and the might of my hand have gotten me this wealth." You shall remember the Lord your God
nasb95: for it is he who gives you power to get wealth.

esv: But God shows his own love for us in that while we were still sinners Christ died for us.
niv: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners
nasb95: Christ died for us.

esv: But if you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead
niv: you will be saved.
nasb95: If you declare with your mouth

esv: And this is the testimony
niv: that God gave us eternal life and this life is in his Son. Whoever has the Son has life; whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life. I write these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God
nasb95: that you may know that you have eternal life.

esv: All scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching
niv: for reproof
nasb95: for correction and for training in righteousness that the man of God may be complete

esv: And he gave the apostles
niv: the prophets
nasb95: the evangelists
